attributes.action: ban any stag party from taking place more than 50 miles from the primary residence of either the groom or best man, especially if the best man is Scottish and the groom has been a UK citizen for less than 12 months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1. It's bad for the environment 2. It's a waste of time and money 3. It increases crowding on trains and congestion on roads 4. London is better than Bristol anyway

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
